entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Solo Mini Golf
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Pack IVï¼š$1.99 â†’ $1.49 [$1.49 ~ $1.99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$0.49

In-App Purchases

  • Pack IVï¼š$1.49
  • Pack Iï¼š$0.29
  • Pack IIï¼š$0.49
  • Pack IIIï¼š$0.99

Application Description

Immerse yourself in a world of solitary enjoyment as you navigate through beautifully crafted courses. Solo mini golf brings the classic game to your fingertips with easy to master controls. Pull the ball aim and release to take your shot with precision. Revel in the satisfaction of the perfect putts as you conquer rounds with obstacles, speed and many more. Â  Download solo mini golf now and discover the perfect blend of challenge, serenity and solo golfing fun.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

Card.Noteï¼šå°æŸä¹¦ç™¾ä¸‡åšä¸»ç§è—æ¨èçš„æ‰‹è´¦ç±»App è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾ä»¥å¡ç‰‡ä¸ºä¸»è¦è®¾è®¡ç†å¿µçš„æç®€è®°äº‹ App ï¼› ä½ å†™çš„æ¯ä¸€æ®µæ–‡å­—éƒ½å¯ä»¥ç”Ÿæˆä¸€å¼ å¼ ç²¾ç¾çš„å¡ç‰‡ ã€‚ ä½ å¯ä»¥ç”¨å®ƒæ¥å†™è¯—ã€çŸ­æ–‡ã€éšæƒ³ï¼› ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ç”¨å®ƒæ¥å†™æ—¥è®°ã€æ¸…å•ã€è§„åˆ’ã€è¦äº‹æé†’ï¼› è¿˜å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ç”¨è¯­éŸ³è¾“å…¥æ¥è®°å½•æ¯ä¸ªç¬é—´çš„å¿µå¤´ã€‚ ã€ŒCard.Noteã€ä¹å¤§ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼š 1.æç®€è®¾è®¡ å¾ªç€æç®€çš„è®¾è®¡ç†å¿µï¼Œç»“åˆå›¾æ ‡åŠæ‰‹åŠ¿æ“ä½œï¼Œè½»æ¾ä¸Šæ‰‹ã€‚ 2.æ–‡é’å®šåˆ¶ ç²¾é€‰äº† 10 æ¬¾è®°äº‹å­—ä½“åŠ 9 ç§æ–‡é’ä¸»é¢˜è‰²å¡ã€å¤šè¾¾ 100 ç§ä¸åŒé¢œè‰²çš„è‰²å¡ï¼Œå¯æ ¹æ®å–œå¥½å®šåˆ¶å„ç§å¡ç‰‡ã€‚ 3.å…¨å±€å¡ç‰‡åŒ– å……åˆ†èå…¥äº†å¡ç‰‡è®¾è®¡ç†å¿µï¼Œå¯æ ¹æ®å–œå¥½éšæ„åˆ‡æ¢æ¨ªç‰ˆæˆ–ç«–ç‰ˆä¸¤ç§å¡ç‰‡ç¬”è®°æ˜¾ç¤ºæ ·å¼ã€‚ 4.å…¨å±€æ‰‹åŠ¿åŒ– ä¸‹æ‹‰å¯æ–°å»ºç¬”è®°ï¼Œå†ä¸‹æ‹‰å¯ä¿å­˜ç¬”è®°ï¼Œå³æ»‘å¯å‘¼å‡ºä½œå“é›†ï¼Œé•¿æŒ‰å¡ç‰‡å¯é¢„è§ˆå¡ç‰‡å†…å®¹ã€‚ 5.è¯­éŸ³å½•å…¥ æ‰“å¼€ä¾¿å¯ç›´æ¥è¯­éŸ³è¾“å…¥ï¼Œéšæ—¶è®°å½•æ¯ä¸ªçµå…‰æ˜¾ç°çš„æƒ³æ³•ã€‚ä½ å¯ä»¥æŠŠå®ƒå½“ä½œæˆiOSæ–‡è‰ºç‰ˆâ€œé—ªå¿µèƒ¶å›Šâ€ã€‚ 6.è¦äº‹æé†’ï¼š å¯è®¾ç½®æé†’é—¹ç§ï¼Œé‡è¦äº‹æƒ…å’Œè®¡åˆ’ä¸å†é”™å¤±ã€‚ 7.å¿«æ·é«˜æ•ˆ æ”¯æŒWidgetå°ç»„ä»¶åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå¯ç›´æ¥åœ¨åº”ç”¨å›¾æ ‡æˆ–Widgetå¿«é€Ÿæ‰“å¼€åº”ç”¨æˆ–ç›´æ¥è¿›å…¥åˆ›å»ºç¬”è®°ç•Œé¢ï¼Œè®©ä½ éšæ—¶é«˜æ•ˆåœ°è®°å½•æ¯ä¸ªå¿µå¤´ã€‚ 8.iCloudäº‘åŒæ­¥ æ”¯æŒiCloudäº‘åŒæ­¥ï¼Œå¤šå°è®¾å¤‡é—´æ•°æ®å¯ä»»æ„åŒæ­¥ã€‚ 9.æ·±è‰²æ¨¡å¼ å…¨å±€é€‚é…æ·±è‰²æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œè§†è§‰èˆ’é€‚ä¸åˆºçœ¼ã€‚ æ„Ÿè°¢ä¸‹è½½ï¼Œç”Ÿæ´»æ„‰å¿«ã€‚ å¦‚æœ‰é—®é¢˜æˆ–å»ºè®®ï¼Œè¯·è”ç³»å¼€å‘è€… å¾®åšï¼šåœŸå‘³æ–‡è‰ºå¼€å‘è€… é‚®ç®±ï¼šyande18@126.com

entry.title: Dead Cells
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š$8.99 â†’ $3.99 [$3.99 ~ $8.99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š$3.99

In-App Purchases

  • The Bad Seedï¼š$3.99
  • Fatal Fallsï¼š$3.99
  • The Queen and the Seaï¼š$3.99
  • Return to Castlevaniaï¼š$6.99

Application Description

Death is not the end. Play as a failed alchemic experiment and explore the sprawling, ever-changing castle to find out what happened on this gloomy islandâ€¦! That is, assuming youâ€™re able to fight your way past its keepers. Dead Cells is a roguevania action platformer that will require you to master frantic 2D combat with a wide variety of weapons and skills against merciless minions and boss. Kill. Die. Learn. Repeat. First available on PC and consoles, the indie hit Dead Cells is now slaying foes on mobile! Main Features â€¢ Roguevania: The progressive exploration of an interconnected world, with the replayability of a rogue-lite and the adrenaline-pumping threat of permadeath â€¢ Frantic and Dynamic 2D Action: Learn your enemiesâ€™ patterns to stay alive, or prepare to be sent back to your cell before you can say â€œbaguetteâ€ â€¢ Nonlinear Progression: Unlock new levels with every death, opt for the path that suits your current build, your playstyle or just your mood. Surely, the ramparts canâ€™t be as bad as the sewers, right? â€¢ Play at your own pace: Will you explore every nook and cranny of the castle, or rush to the end? *Latest updates are available: Clean Cut & The End is Near* RETURN TO CASTLEVANIA DLC Time for some vampire slaying â€¢ New storyline - overcome the Ruler of Darkness alongside Alucard and Richter Belmont, â€¢ 2 new biomes - Explore Dracula's Castle and its outskirts â€¢ 9 new monsters - Werewolves, haunted armors, and medusas are waiting for you â€¢ 14 new weapons - wield the Vampire Killer or the Holy Water to defeat creatures of the night, â€¢ 3 new bosses - go fangs to fangs against Death and Dracula himself â€¢ 20 new outfits - dress as your favorite Castlevania characters such as Simon and Richter Belmont or Alucard â€¢ Alternative soundtracks - play along 51 Castlevania original tracks and 12 tunes reimagined in the style of Dead Cells THE BAD SEED DLC You reap what you sow â€¢ New levels to lose your head in the not-so-peaceful Dilapidated Arboretum and the noxious Morass of the Banished â€¢ New monsters to rip to pieces: get to know the locals, such as the Jerkshroom and the Yeeter â€¢ New weapons to play with: trim sticking-out heads with the Scythe Claw, or make them dance to the sound of the Rhythm n' Bouzouki â€¢ New boss to fight against: Mama Tick is dying to meet you FATAL FALLS DLC Ready for a leap of faith? â€¢ 3 new biomes - Get some fresh air at the Fractured Shrines, splash around at the Undying Shores and take a picture at the Mausoleum â€¢ 8 new monsters - The Cold Blooded Guardians and their friends would love to teach you about their culture. ... Wait, aren't those relatives of yours in the Undying Shores...? â€¢ 7 new weapons - Lil' Serenade is perfect for breaking the ice with the locals, although the Snake Fangs would make for a perfect souvenir... â€¢ 1 new boss - The Scarecrow is very proud of his gardening skills and won't hesitate to show off QUEEN AND THE SEA DLC Take it to the sea! â€¢ 2 new biomes - Battle your way through a rotten shipwreck, or scale a burning lighthouse and confront your deadliest foe yet. â€¢ 9 new weapons, including a throwable shark, a trident and a pirate hook hand (eyepatch not included). â€¢ 2 new bosses - Don't lose your head before you meet the Queen! This DLC also gives you the usual extras: - A not-so-cute pet. - Loads of new outfits. - New enemies to bash. WARNING: Devices with less than 2 Gb of RAM may not be able to run this content correctly. We recommend not to take this DLC if your device is under 2gb of RAM. Carefully redesigned for mobile with a revamped interface â€¢ Two game modes available: Original & Auto-Hit â€¢ Custom controls & More touch controls options available: Change the buttonsâ€™ position and size to your liking, swipe to dodgeâ€¦ â€¢ MFi external controller support â€¢ No ads, no F2P mechanics! If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Application Description

Experience survival horror like never before in the 8th major installment in the Resident Evil franchise - Resident Evil Village. With detailed graphics, intense first-person action and masterful storytelling, the terror has never felt more realistic. ------------------------------------------------------------ â– In-App Purchases â– Resident Evil Village (Base Game) ãƒ»The Trauma Pack DLC ãƒ»Samurai Edge - AW Model-01 ãƒ»Resident Evil 7 Found Footage Filter ãƒ»Resident Evil 7 Tape Recorder Save Point ãƒ»Saferoom Music "Go Tell Aunt Rhody" ãƒ»Mr. Everywhere Weapon Charm ãƒ»Unlock "Village of Shadows" Difficulty ãƒ»The Tragedy of Ethan Winters Artwork ãƒ»The Baker Incident Report ãƒ»Survival Resources Pack ãƒ»Mr. Raccoon Weapon Charm â– Winters' Expansion ãƒ»Experience brand-new additional content for the award-winning modern horror masterpiece Resident Evil Village: Third Person Mode, The Mercenaries Additional Orders, and Shadows of Rose. ãƒ»Street Wolf Outfit ãƒ»Street Wolf Outfit for Rose (applies to Shadow of Rose content only) â– Extra Content Shop All Access Vouche ------------------------------------------------------------ â– By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. â– A network connection is required when starting the application. â– About the End User License Agreement ãƒ»This End User License Agreement (this â€œAgreementâ€) applies to the userâ€™s use of this game software program (the â€œProgramâ€). ãƒ»THIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. ãƒ»Those users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ â– A limited part of the base game can be played for free. In order to play the full game, an in-app purchase is required. â– This game can be played without a controller, however we recommend using a controller as the game has been optimized for controller use. â– This application is approximately 35GB. Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. We recommend downloading the data in an environment with good connectivity. â– Save data upload and download functionality via iCloud Drive has been added. â– Save data cannot be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. â– Resident Evil Village does not support Universal Purchase. â– Purchase Precautions ãƒ»After purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. ãƒ»In-app purchases can only be used by the Apple Account that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. â– Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.capcom-games.com/apple/en-us/ ------------------------------------------------------------ RESIDENT EVIL is a trademark and/or registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD. and/or its subsidiaries in the U.S. and/or other countries.

  • AttachÃ© Case: 'Classic'ï¼š$0.99

Application Description

Survival is just the beginning. Six years have passed since the biological disaster in Raccoon City. Agent Leon S. Kennedy, one of the survivors of the incident, has been sent to rescue the president's kidnapped daughter. He tracks her to a secluded European village, where there is something terribly wrong with the locals. And the curtain rises on this story of daring rescue and grueling horror where life and death, terror and catharsis intersect. Featuring modernized gameplay, a reimagined storyline, and vividly detailed graphics, Resident Evil 4 marks the rebirth of an industry juggernaut. Relive the nightmare that revolutionized survival horror. ------------------------------------------------------------ â– By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. â– A network connection is required when starting the application. â– About the End User License Agreement ãƒ»This End User License Agreement (this â€œAgreementâ€) applies to the userâ€™s use of this game software program (the â€œProgramâ€). ãƒ»THIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. ãƒ»Those users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ â– A limited part of the base game can be played for free. In order to play the full game, an in-app purchase is required. â– Keyboard and mouse are not supported. â– We recommend playing this game with a controller. It can be played on an iPad, but using a controller will provide a better experience. Note: Please check the Apple website for controllers compatible with iPad. Not all controllers will work as intended. â– This application is approximately 30GB. Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. We recommend downloading the data in an environment with good connectivity. â– Estimated download time based on connection speed: 10Mbps - Over 6 hours 100Mbps - 30 to 40 minutes 300Mbps - 8 to 10 minutes â– Save data can be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. â– Purchase Precautions ãƒ»After purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. ãƒ»In-app purchases can only be used by the Apple Account that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. â– Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.capcom-games.com/apple/en-us/ ------------------------------------------------------------ RESIDENT EVIL is a trademark and/or registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD. and/or its subsidiaries in the U.S. and/or other countries.
